short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: B&B and Friends displays the price per person for B&B listings, simplifying your comparison and decision-making process.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Time is money, and with B&B and Friends, you'll save both! No more wasting time calculating the price per person when browsing B&B listings. My extension automatically displays the cost per individual, so you can easily compare options and make smarter decisions in seconds. Whether you're planning a solo trip or a group getaway, we do the math for youâ€”because your time is better spent planning the adventure, not crunching numbers!
